thread.section_title: Goldmoney.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goldmoney.com | www.goldmoney.com
thread.title: A Moldes

author: A Moldes
title: A Moldes
text:
Goldmoney services offer a cheap, easy and safe way to own gold, it's more for savings than for trading, so it's basically a 100% cash coeficient bank account with gold standard.
It's great for the average person as it doesn't incentive bulk purchases, small deposits are cool too.
You can make payments from inside their network at an unmatchedy 0,5% fee only, or recieve payments, they have tools for bussinesses.
You can liquify your wealth back to a prepaid card, paypal or traditional bank account anytime.
You can pick the vault in the state you prefer.
You mostly only pay 0,5% fees for transactions.
Everything there is, is great, and there's room to expand features that makes it even more useful.
Customer service is okay in my personal expirience.
